textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are FIT: Runs large. Please size down 1/2 size. Size & Fit Heel: 1.5in / 40mm MEASUREMENTS This item cannot be gift-boxed. Imported, China. Leather: Cowhide. Burnished, snake-embossed suede lends luxe texture to 10 Crosby Derek Lam pumps, styled with a slim, rounded toe. An inset elastic gore accents the ankle strap, and an exposed zip closes the back. Stacked kitten heel and leather sole. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer A three-time CFDA award winner and Parsons graduate, Derek Lam spent twelve years in the industry before launching his eponymous label in 2003. In 2011, he launched his diffusion line, Derek Lam 10 Crosby. Named after the location of his first store and headquarters, the line is inspired by the cool, downtown New York girls the designer spots in the neighborhood.
